title: Neeye Vaazhkai Enben Song Lyrics With English Meaning
stanzas:
Neeye Vaazhkai Enben Song Lyrics With English Meaning from Pugazh Tamil Flim. Neeye Vaazhkai Enben is sung by singers, Arijit Singh & Mervin Solomon.Lyrics is penned by Na. Muthukumar, Prakash Francis
Neeye Vaazhkai Enben Song Lyrics English Translation
Lyrics in Thanglish
Neeye vaazhkai yenbaen
Ini vaazhum
naatkal ellaam.
Neeye podhum yenbaen
Uyire en ulagamey

Neeye kaadhal yenbaen
Ini jeevan vaazhum unnaal.
Neeye vendum yenbaen
Uyire en ulagamey.

Sirikiraalo
konjam sidhaigiren
Nadakiraalo
pinnal alaigiren.
Therindhum ye ho
Ayyo tholaigiren
kaadhalin kaigalil
Vizhugiren.

Neeye vaazhkai yenbaen
Ini vaazhum
naatkal ellaam
Neeye podhum yenbaen
Uyire en ulagamey

Yedhayo solla
vaarthai ondru
Naan korkiren.

Yedhirae unnai
paartha udane
Yaen verkkiren.

Penney un paarvayaale
Alaipaaikiren.
Aaaha indha neram naanum
Kudaisaaigiren.

Kaadhoramaai
unjal kodu
Kaadhoramaai
unjal kodu
Penney un kammal
pol naan aaduven.

Kaal oramaai
siraigal idu
Penney
un kolusaaga
naan maaruven

Neeye vaazhkai yenbaen

naatkal ellaam
Neeye podhum yenbaen
Uyire en ulagamey

Neeye kaadhal yenbaen
Ini jeevan vaazhum unnaal.
Neeye vendum yenbaen
Uyire en ulagamey

Sirikiraalo
konjam sidhaigiren
Nadakiraalo
pinnaal alaigiren.
Therindhum ye ho,
 Ayyo tholaigiren
kaadhalin
kaigalil Vizhugiraen.

Neeye vaazhkai yenbaen
Neeye podhum yenbaen
Uyire en ulagamey		 English Meaning
You’re my life,
Throughout
my days of living.
You’re enough for me
You’re my life, my world.

You’re my love.
I’ll live coz of you.
I want you
You’re my life, my world.

When she smiles
I’am going mad.
When she walks
I'm following her.
Knowing myself,
I’m getting lost.
I felt in the hands
of love.

my days of living.

You’re my life, my world.

I’m joining
words to say
something.

But why I get sweat ?
on seeing
You.

I’m unstable
When you see me.
This moment,
I’m mesmerized.

In ears..
give me a swing.
In ears..
give me a swing.
I’ll dance like a hoose
On your ears.

Prison me
On your legs.
girl ,
I’ll change to
 Anklets.
